title: School Colors Day
description: Neon DayDress Like A teacher DayTrash Bag & Duct Tape DaySenior Citizen's DayFavorite Character Day5 Spirit Week days.5 painful ways to die.17 yr old Summer McFarland wants to be editor-in-chief of her school newspaper. In order to get the job she has to submit a killer a story to her journalism teacher and she knows just the story that will do the trick. She decides to write about her own classmates that went missing last Spirit Week, but in order to find out what happened to them she has to retrace their steps, which lead her right back to haunted Christopher High School. Can she and her journalism classmates make it out alive or will they be the next tragic story?
author: Alshia Moyez
